name: Spider-Man - Mysterio's Menace [GBA]
description: Spider-Man: Mysterio's Menace is an action video game for the Game Boy Advance, based upon Spider-Man, released on September 19, 2001. The game was released in Japan on April 26, 2002. It came on a Twin Pack cartridge bundled with X2: Wolverine's Revenge in 2005.
